  • Summers can be mild, hot and humid. On those steamy days, a reliable cooling system in your home can make all the difference. Whether you need a simple repair, cleaning, or complete air conditioning system make-over, our technicians at Howard Mechanical are equipped to handle all of your needs.

  • Howard Mechanical strives to offer the highest quality of professionalism, timeliness, and heating service for every valued customer. From furnace and boiler repair to new heating system installation, our experts can handle any job.

    View Services

  • Regular HVAC maintenance is a great way to save you time and money on Heating and cooling repairs as well as energy costs. Having a maintenance contract will ensure that your system is operating properly and will properly serve you when you need it most.
